mapper.select: SELECT b_id AS id, user_id AS userId, spfz_id AS spfzId, good_id AS goodId, b_status AS STATUS, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, grade AS grade, machines_id AS machinesId, mountings_id AS mountingsId FROM b_order WHERE mountings_id = #{id} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.b_id AS id, a.user_id AS userId, b.commodity_name AS commodityName, a.b_status AS status, a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.grade, c.machines_name AS machinesName, d.b_name AS name, a.deliver_note AS deliverNote, a.order_no AS orderNo FROM b_order a LEFT JOIN b_commodity b ON a.good_id = b.commodity_id LEFT JOIN b_machines c ON a.machines_id = c.machines_id LEFT JOIN b_mountings d ON a.mountings_id = d.b_id
and INSTR(b.commodity_name,#{commodityName})
and (a.create_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
